definition: surname Song/the Song dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: By the Song Dynasty some seven centuries later, the porcelain industry was flourishing.
sentences.chinese: 宋代，大約七世紀後，是瓷業最繁榮的時期。

sentences.english: True and touching is the most important feature of emotional expression in female singers Ci.
sentences.chinese: 宋代歌妓詞在情感表達上的最大特點是真切動人。

sentences.english: It is a typical imperial-court decorative painting of Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 該畫爲典型的宋代院體畫，是工筆重彩畫中的佳作。

sentences.english: In a word, Song-Confucianism exerts a far-reaching influence on Song Dynasty aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 綜上所述，宋代理學對宋代美學產生的影響是深遠的。

sentences.english: In a word, Song-Confucianism exerts a far-reaching influence on Song Dynasty aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 綜上所述，宋代理學對宋代美學產生的影響是深遠的。

sentences.english: Yet Yuan's learning of Du was different from his predecessor in Song Dynasty, Zhou Bangyan.
sentences.chinese: 其詞之學杜，與宋代周邦彥詞的學杜又有所不同。

sentences.english: The author of the Qingming Shanghe Tu Song painters picturing .
sentences.chinese: 《清明上河圖》的作者是宋代畫家張擇端。

sentences.english: Bianliang Imperial College is a special branch in the central engraving institutions of Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 在宋代中央刻書機構中，汴梁國子監可謂是一枝獨秀。

sentences.english: Actually there was no Baling County but Yuezhou during the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 宋代只有嶽州，沒有巴陵郡。

sentences.english: The formation of the Fulao people of South Fujian can be divided into two periods-the Dongjin—Tang period and the Song dynasty period.
sentences.chinese: 閩南福佬人的形成分爲東晉至唐和宋代兩個時期。

sentences.english: Song Dynasty was a much more flourishing period for sericulture in history.
sentences.chinese: 宋代是我國曆史上蠶桑業較爲發達的時期。

sentences.english: There are three big-scale education innovations in Song Dynasty respectively, namely Qingli Education Innovations, Xining Education Innovations and Chongning Education Innovations.
sentences.chinese: 范仲淹慶曆興學掀開了宋代三次大規模興學的序幕。

sentences.english: Finally it draws out Fan Zhongyan's contribution of regulated fu.
sentences.chinese: 最後闡明範仲淹對宋代律賦特徵形成的貢獻。

sentences.english: The geomantic omen doctrine was very current in North Song dynasty and had much influence on the mausoleum system then.
sentences.chinese: 宋代陰陽堪輿術影響甚盛，陵寢制度深受其影響。

sentences.english: However, the regular script then couldn't match that of Jin and Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 然而宋代楷書，卻不能與晉唐楷書同日而語了。

sentences.english: Temples of witchcraft are so widespread that they have turned into kinds of social public hazard.
sentences.chinese: 宋代民間淫祠氾濫成災，成爲一種嚴重的社會公害。

definition: the Song dynasty (960-1279)/refers to the Northern (960-1127) and Southern Song (1128-1279)
Song Dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
the early Ming (i.e. from second half of 14th century)
Jin Dynasty (1115-1234), founded by the Jurchen 女真[Nu:3 zhen1] people of North China, a precursor of the Mongol Yuan Dynasty
